result.reason: Feature request to prevent accidental undocking of panels by adding a 'Lock Panels' option.
result.approach: Add 'LockPanels' setting to OptionsTabsPanelsPage. Update FrmMain to apply AllowEndUserDocking = !LockPanels to all DockContents in pnlDock when setting changes.

attempts.raw_output:
